response.overview: A turbo-charged journey through the wildest decade of sci-fi and fantasy cinema! Strap in for two hours of non-stop thrills, chills, lasers, swords, spaceships, aliens, and more as more than 70 of the best 80s trailers are featured on one incredible, out of this world program. Originally presented on September 10th and 20th, 2025 at the GAP Theatre in Wind Gap, PA exclusively on 35mm.
response.title: The Fantastic 80s Time Machine
